name: UFO Oddball! Multiplayer Construct 3 Game + Tutorial
name_original: UFO Oddball! Multiplayer Construct 3 Game + Tutorial
description:
UFO ODDBALL!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left Click to Shoot
  • HOLD space bar to carry the UFO when you are close

Objective

  • Hold UFO using spacebar (hold it down!) as long as possible
  • First to 100 seconds or most points at end of round wins.

---

This was created in order to better learn the Construct 3 built in multiplayer plugin.  I have created a tutorial that goes along with it for Construct 3 users and also provided the source file for people to build off of in their own games (see file below to download!)

Check it out on YouTube and let me know what you think!  Subscribe if you enjoyed, would make my day :)

---

I am a youtuber, creator of games / tutorials, and actively building a collection of art / assets for creators to use royalty free in their games.  If you would like to support me, please consider subscribing to my YouTube channel (game dev focused) and or supporting me on Patreon.  Those who subscribe to the "Game Asset Supporter" tier will get access to all premium / paid art I own the rights to posted here on itch (new assets added monthly!).  Cheers!
